revisions.rev:
{{Orphan|date=August 2010}}
{{BLP sources|date=July 2009}} '''Ameer Zeb Khan''' is a Pakistani [[male model]], and the winner of the 2008 [[Lux Style Award]] for Best Male Model.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.luxstyleawards.com/Fashion_Jury_Nominations.doc|title=Fashion Nominations announced for 7th LUX Style Awards|publisher=LUX Style Awards|accessdate=2009-10-11}}</ref><ref name="IM">{{cite news|url=http://jang.com.pk/thenews/nov2008-weekly/nos-09-11-2008/instep/article1.htm|title=Fashion Rocks - The LSAs are swept away by the Gen Xers of Pakistan's fashion industry|last=Imtiaz|first=Saba|date=November 9, 2008|publisher=Instep Magazine|accessdate=2009-10-11}}</ref>
== Biography == Khan was born in Karachi, although he comes from a Pathan family from Buner. He is the youngest in the family. After completing his [[Bachelor of Arts|bachelors]] in commerce, he began working toward achieving his [[MBA]].
Ameer entered the fashion industry when a friend took him to Creative Services and he started doing shows with [[Frieha Altaf]].{{When|date=August 2009}} He met Khawar Riaz at the first Lux Style Awards ceremony and was invited to Lahore. At the time he did only one shoot, and then left the scene for two years to complete his MBA.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.mag4you.com/spotlight/spotlight.asp?title=Ameer+Zeb+Khan&content_id=5458&bhcp=1|title=Spotlight on Ameer Zeb Khan|publisher=Mag4You|accessdate=2009-10-11}}</ref> When he returned, he joined Khawar and has been working with him since then, as well as being a coordination executive for [[Pakistan State Oil|PSO]]. [http://www.zeenatstyle.com/2010/02/ameerzebkhan-mens-salwar-kameez.html See Ameer's work at Zeenatstyle.com]
